# AI Life Summary

> AI-powered life summary generator that creates personalized insights based on your birthday.

## About
AI Life Summary is a free web application that generates unique, personalized life summaries using artificial intelligence. Users enter their birthday and receive a one-sentence summary that captures their personality and life essence.

## Features
- Free AI-generated life summaries based on birthday
- Instant results with no registration required
- Available in 5 languages (English, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish)
- Share results on social media
- Download results as images
- Mobile-friendly responsive design

## Main Pages
- /: Home page with birthday input form
- /generate: Results page showing personalized life summary
- /blog: Blog with articles about personality, astrology, and self-discovery
- /about: Information about the service
- /contact: Contact information

## How It Works
1. User enters their birthday (month and day)
2. AI analyzes the date and generates a unique life summary
3. User can view, share, or download their personalized result

## Target Audience
- People interested in personality analysis
- Users curious about birthday-based insights
- Social media users who enjoy sharing personality content

## Contact
Website: https://goodpicknow.com
